backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with item, branding, profile, and basket logic plus access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration converting old items to new items by adding a default category field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, layout, branding-aware header, basket icon, footer, and global dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a non-admin user attempts to access restricted pages.
Admin tool for editing an item's description and replacing its image with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublishTogg: Toggle button component that publishes or unpublishes an item using mutation hooks and shows status badges and loading states.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Displays an item preview card with image, title, description, price, and navigation to the item detail page.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout and conditionally shows admin options via a dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/Model3DViewer.ts: Renders a 3D model using react-three-fiber with camera controls, fallback content, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PriceEditor.tsx: UI for editing an item's price, validating input, and saving via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save a profile.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHeroMe: Displays either a 3D model or image as hero media along with customizable title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Dialog for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries, saving settings via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBasket.ts: Manages a shopping basket stored in localStorage, exposing helpers to add, remove, check, and list item IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as items, profiles, storefront info, and admin checks through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: Implements React Query hooks for Stripe integration, including configuration checks, session creation, and session status retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based theme variables, typography, and utility classes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/idEncoding.ts: Provides helper functions to encode and decode item IDs between Uint8Array and URL‑safe base64 strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin page for editing branding, allowing logo and hero media uploads, previews, text updates, and saving changes to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBulkUploadPage.t: Admin interface for bulk uploading item photos with progress tracking, category assignment, verification, and post-upload navigation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page that checks admin and Stripe config status and provides navigation and controls for Stripe setup and branding settings.
frontend/src/pages/BasketPage.tsx: Basket management page showing items, handling removal and checkout, and validating item and Stripe readiness before starting a checkout session.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Item detail page displaying item info, purchase options, admin tools, and handling add‑to‑basket and direct checkout flows.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple page informing users that payment was cancelled and offering navigation back to storefront or basket.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Payment success page that clears the basket, refreshes item status, checks Stripe session state, and confirms the purchase.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Storefront landing page showing hero media and a grid of items or fallback messaging when items are unavailable.
frontend/src/utils/brandingMedia.ts: Utility functions for validating hero media files, inferring content types, and constructing MediaKind objects for images and 3D models.
frontend/src/utils/bulkUploadVerificatio: Verifies bulk-uploaded items by fetching each item and confirming its image URL is accessible.
frontend/src/utils/itemCategory.ts: Maps between item category labels and backend enums and provides available category options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state document detailing current features, architecture notes, known issues, and versioned requirements for a storefront with admin tools and Stripe integration.
